name: Publishers.TimeGroupingStrategy
desc: A strategy for collecting received elements.

items.name: case byTime(Context, Context.SchedulerTimeType.Stride)
items.desc: A grouping that collects and periodically publishes items.

items.name: case byTimeOrCount(Context, Context.SchedulerTimeType.Stride, Int)
items.desc: A grouping that collects and publishes items periodically or when a buffer reaches a maximum size.
